Achivements.Requirement: Achieved the “Age of the Stars” ending
Defeated Astel, Naturalborn of the Void
Used kindling to set the Erdtree aflame
Upgraded any armament to its highest stage
Restored the power of a Great Rune
Acquired all legendary sorceries and incantations
Achieved the “Lord of the Frenzied Flame” ending
Defeated Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree
Defeated Shardbearer Maliketh the Black Blade
Defeated the Red Wolf of Radagon

Achivements.Achievement Name: Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon
Achivements.Requirement: Defeated Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon

Legendary Armaments.Name: Marais Executioner’s Sword
Legendary Armaments.Description: Reward for clearing Shaded Castle boss fight against Elemer.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Eclipse Shotel
Legendary Armaments.Description: Found in Castle Sol. From the Chuch of the Eclipse Site of Grace, it is just around the corner in the church at the altar.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Sword of Night and Flame
Legendary Armaments.Description: From the Manor Lower Level Site of Grace in Caria Manor you want to run outside and run on the castle walls. Just before you reach the third tower jump to the lower building on your left and from there drop once again to a building with a ladder heading inside the building from the roof. There inside a chest you will find it.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Devourer’s Scepter
Legendary Armaments.Description: Dropped by the NPC “Bernahl” at Warmaster’s Shack when killed. He will leave later in the game. If you missed him here you can instead find him in Volcano Manor and help him with his quest until he disappears. He will later appear in Farum, down the ladder from Beside the Great Bridge Site of Grace as a phantom and you can kill him there for the Devourer’s Scepter.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Golden Order Greatsword
Legendary Armaments.Description: Reward for clearing Cave of the Forlorn, south of the Minor Erdree in the area leading to Haligtree.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Ruins Greatsword
Legendary Armaments.Description: After Radahn is defeated head back to the Redmane Castle. Talk to the announcer in the Church until he leaves. Refresh at Site of grace and defeat the boss duo in the plaza.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Bolt of Gransax
Legendary Armaments.Description: From the Erdtree Sanctuary site of grace, go out the west door where there is an elevator you can take to the lower level. Follow the path down, then jump over the railing on the left to where the giant golden spear is sticking out of the wall. Climb a short distance up the spear to find this weapon. THIS IS MISSABLE – The Royal Capital gets destroyed at the end of the game and then the weapon is gone for this playthrough, but if you have a friend with the weapon you can have it dropped to you in co-op.

Legendary Armaments.Name: Dark Moon Greatsword
Legendary Armaments.Description: Reward for securing the Age of the Stars Ending. After the final talk with Renna it will appear where she was. See Elden Ring How to Get All Endings.

Legendary Ashen Remains.Name: Lhutel the Headless
Legendary Ashen Remains.Description: Found in Tomsword Catacombs west of the Minor Erdtree in Weeping Peninsula.

Legendary Ashen Remains.Name: Black Knife Tiche
Legendary Ashen Remains.Description: Reward for Ringleader’s Evergaol in the northwest corner of Moonlight Plateau.

Legendary Ashen Remains.Name: Redmane Knight Ogha
Legendary Ashen Remains.Description: Finish War-Dead Catacombs in the north of Radahn boss fight arena.

Legendary Ashen Remains.Name: Mimic Tear
Legendary Ashen Remains.Description: Chest in Night’s Sacred Ground behind Stonesword Key Gate. From Ancestral Woods Site of Grace in Siofra River jump to the black building. Follow the ledges and roofs until you get into a cathedral-looking building with an altar. Find the chest at the end of the hallway past the altar.

Legendary Ashen Remains.Name: Ancient Dragon Knight Kristoff
Legendary Ashen Remains.Description: Found in Sainted Hero’s Grave west of Leyndell, the Royal Capital.

Legendary Ashen Remains.Name: Cleanrot Knight Finlay
Legendary Ashen Remains.Description: From the Prayer Room Site of Grace in Elphael, go straight after you teleport there. Go down the first set of stairs and jump the balcony to the pavilion with candles around it. There enter the room and you will find it in a chest.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Flame of the Fell God
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Reward for clearing Malefactor Evergaol in south Liurnia.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Founding Rain of Stars
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Found in Heretical Rise in the east Mountaintop of the Giants. You will have to cross an invisible bridge starting from the other side of the canyon by following barely visible mist showing you the path.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Elden Stars
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Found in Deeproot Depths in a cave full of gigantic Ants. You can reach the cave by following the roots. In the cave you will find it at the exit past all the big ants.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Ranni’s Dark Moon
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Found in Chelona’s Rise on the Moonlight Altar Plateau – you will have to interact with the book and kill 3 white turtles to open the seal. You will reach this area while working towards the Age of the Stars Ending. The first turtle is to the right of the chapel hanging on the wall of the cliff. Number 2 and 3 are problematic because they sometimes refuse to spawn. If number 2 doesn’t spawn for you head to number 3 instead for whom you will have to simply use the wind stream with your mount. Don’t teleport, just ride there. Also the other way around – if number 3 isn’t there, check number 2 instead. The sealed Rise opens after killing 2 turtles (1+2 or 1+3), it seems a big glitchy.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Comet Azur
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Mt. Gelmir, Primeval Sorcerer Azur Site of Grace – get if from the Sorcerer there.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Stars of Ruin
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Sellen Questline – find corpse of her master in Mt. Gelmir, (Comet Azur location – see Sorcery #5 in this list) talk to her and she will give you a key to the seal in a hidden cave south – find the hidden cave southwest of Fort Faroth, find the spell there. In order to find the cave you will have to hit an illusory wall! Sellen herself can be found in Waypoint Cellar Ruins.

Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Name: Greyoll’s Roar
Legendary Sorcery-Incantations.Description: Kill Greyoll and buy it with Dragon Hearts at the Cathedral of the Dragon Communion. Greyoll is the big dragon close to Fort Faroth. You have to kill the 5 smaller dragons surrounding him and afterward Greyoll will be one hit away from death. Aggro the dragons one by one starting behind Greyoll.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Radagon Icon
Legendary Talismans.Description: Can be found in Academy of Raya Lucaria. From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, head straight to get outside. Then immediately turn right, go around the corner and jump to the balcony. Take the ladder up and on the big balcony you can find it in a chest.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Radagon’s Soreseal
Legendary Talismans.Description: Can be found in Fort Faroth. When entering the Fort you will see it behind the wooden wall. Use the ladder to get to the roof and drop into the last hole there. Navigate through the catwalk to get it.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Godfrey Icon
Legendary Talismans.Description: Reward for clearing the Golden Lineage Evergaol in the south of Altus Plateau / Southwest from the Capital.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Moon of Nokstella
Legendary Talismans.Description: In a chest under the giant throne at the highest section in the west of Nokstella.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman
Legendary Talismans.Description: In Elphael starting from the Drainage Channel Site of Grace, run on the roots and jump through the hole in the roof into the chappel. There on the balcony you will find it in a chest.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Marika’s Soreseal
Legendary Talismans.Description: In Elphael starting from the Prayer Room Site of Grace go outside and keep dropping down until you reach the bottom area. There you can find a gate you have to open with a Stonesword Key. Inside you will find it at an altar.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Old Lord’s Talisman
Legendary Talismans.Description: In Farum from Beside the Great Bridge Site of Grace instead of following the Bridge towards the boss, head in the other direction and find it in a chest at the end.

Legendary Talismans.Name: Erdtree’s Favor +2
Legendary Talismans.Description: This Talisman can only be obtained after the Capital becomes a desert (endgame). From the Forbidden Lands east of the capital, head back towards the capital, take the elevator down and you will find it on a dead tree.
